title: 🎬 Video Editor for YouTube Shorts (Opus Clip)
description_text:
We're looking for a sharp, strategic video editor to turn our long-form YouTube videos into short-form content that stops the scroll, delivers value fast, and drives real engagement.
You’ll use Opus Clip to generate rough cuts — but the real magic comes from your judgment. You’ll choose the clips that actually land, then shape them into clean, high-retention vertical videos for Shorts, Reels, and TikTok.
This is not an assembly-line editing gig. This is for someone who understands retention, pacing, and context — and wants to grow with a brand that’s making a real impact in the education space.
ABOUT US
YouTube channel: LSAT Unplugged
23K+ subscribers and growing
Audience: future law students (ages 22–35)
Content: LSAT coaching, law school admissions, expert strategy
Mission: help students get into law school — often debt-free
WHAT YOU’LL DO
Use Opus Clip to generate draft clips
Review and refine only the clips that make sense without context
Edit 20–50 short-form vertical videos per week (YouTube Shorts, TikTok, Reels)
WHAT SUCCESS LOOKS LIKE
Clips that regularly hit 1K+ views and maintain 70%+ watch time on platforms like Shorts, Reels, or TikTok
Strong hooks that stop the scroll
Subscriber growth from Shorts
WHAT WE’RE LOOKING FOR
Strong storytelling instincts
Experience editing short-form content from podcasts, interviews, or talking-heads
Familiar with Opus Clip and Descript
Reliable, detail-oriented, and self-managing
WHAT YOU GET
Weekly work with room to grow
Creative freedom
Clear brand assets and direction
Potential to take on higher-level content strategy
A meaningful mission and real audience impact
Your edits won’t disappear into the void — they’ll be seen by thousands of future law students every week.
High-volume, repeatable work — most edits follow a clear formula and take ~10–15 minutes once you get the hang of it
Opportunity to grow with a fast-scaling brand — potential for bonuses, raises, and strategy work over time
Your work won’t sit in a drive — every short gets published to a real audience with built-in reach
PAY
$3 per short (20–50 per week)
Most clips take ~10–15 minutes to finalize, especially with Opus Clip assisting.
Performance bonuses available — earn an extra $2 per short that hits 5K+ views or performs exceptionally well.
Room to grow into a higher-level role with more pay and responsibility if you're crushing it.

title: Web Designer & Webflow Certified Developer Needed for Website Revamp
description_text:
FirmRoom is a fast-growing platform for secure document sharing and deal collaboration, used by investment banks, private equity firms, and legal teams. We're evolving to be an AI-first solution focused on simplicity, speed, and modern workflows and we need a website that reflects that.
Our site is built in Webflow with a solid foundation, but we’re evolving our product - and the site needs to reflect that with sharper design, stronger UX, and new landing pages that better tell our story and convert. This is not a from-scratch job. You’ll be working with an existing site - but we’re looking for someone with taste, patience, and precision to take it to the next level.
Scope Includes:
Audit and improve our existing pages (starting with homepage and pricing)
Design new pages in Figma and implement them in Webflow
Build with clean CMS logic and responsive best practices
Ensure consistent design system and styling across pages
Collaborate closely with our internal team
Ideal Candidate:
Webflow Certified (must include your certification URL)
Highly skilled in Figma and modern design systems
Portfolio includes clean, modern SaaS or B2B websites
Patient, thoughtful, and collaborative
Bonus: experience with conversion optimization and light SEO
Able to turn product vision into clear, usable, credible web experiences
Pages for Audit:
Homepage (https://firmroom.com)
Pricing Page (https://firmroom.com/pricing)
To Apply, Please Submit:
1. A brief audit of the homepage and pricing page - list your Top 10 improvement suggestions (visual, UX, copy structure or more)
2. Your Top 2 Figma designs you’re most proud of
3. At least 1 live Webflow site you’ve built (especially if you designed it too)
4. Your Webflow Certification URL (required)
If Shortlisted:
We’ll move forward with a small paid test project to evaluate fit before diving into the broader scope.

title: Looking for LONG TERM Video Editor/ Compilations to Compile Visuals/ Stick Man  Animations - Contract to Hire
description_text:
Videos MUST be 8 minutes UNLESS otherwise indicated.
I'm looking for a long term article video editor who can compile clips and images to match a script that we provide related to the following topics: Lord Of The Rings
Video editor should be able to do the following:
* Speak fluent English
* Communicate effectively
* Turn around time in 3 days or less
* Be creative and humorous
* MUST be able to edit a MINIMUM of at least 4 videos a week.
If you have read the middle of this job descp., please type your favorite animal at the beginning or end of your proposal.
As you can tell, I am looking for the long term video editor and do have high expectations, but keep in mind, this will be consistent daily work if you are able to provide, and this will be compensated quite well. We have been working with 4 video editors already for 3+ months, but we need more to join our team!
Again, we will be providing the script and voiceover, we will simply need visuals for it and for it to be put together nicely and creatively with animations.
So for the first type of video, here is what we’re looking for very similar to: https://www.youtube.com/@StickmanAnakin
TAKE NOTE how it has the following:
-THE BEGINNING OF THE VIDEO- Show a clip that is EXTREMELY relevant to the title.
-Show the numbers with appeal and emphasis; if it’s not a countdown script, show the subheadings
-Video editor will need to find 3 types of visuals: clips w/o audio, images and animations.
-All clips and images can be ripped but should never last longer than 6 seconds
-Entire video should be greater than 8 minutes unless otherwise indicated
-Background music should be copyright free
This is our GUIDELINE that we follow across all our videos.
Potential contractors will be interviewed through phone/zoom.
Here are more examples of videos we need done similar to:
https://www.youtube.com/@GoodEnoughAnimation
Additional Questions:
Are you okay with the rate of $100 for 5 videos?
How many videos can you handle per week?
To the best of your understanding, can you rephrase what kind of video I am seeking?
You will be instantly hired if you created a top 10 or faceless youtube videos before. Have you created one?

title: Graphic Designer for marketing agency servicing eCom DTC brands running paid FB/iG ads - Contract to Hire
description_text:
We’re a fast-growing marketing agency focused on helping e-commerce brands elevate their digital presence. We’re looking for a talented Graphic Designer to join our team on a part-time basis. In this role, you will collaborate closely with our creative and media teams to design visually compelling content that resonates with our clients' target audiences across various digital platforms, particularly Meta (Facebook & Instagram).
**Responsibilities:**
- **Creative Design:** Design high-quality, visually engaging graphics for social media ads, websites, email campaigns, and more, tailored to our clients' brand identities.
- **Brand Consistency:** Ensure all designs align with client brand guidelines, maintaining consistency across various digital platforms.
- **Ad Design & Optimization:** Create ad creatives that drive engagement and conversions. Continuously collaborate with the media buying team to optimize designs based on performance metrics.
- **Collaborative Projects:** Work with the media buying team to develop ad creatives, landing pages, and other visual assets that align with campaign goals.
- **Adaptability:** Design for different digital channels, ensuring that graphics are optimized for Facebook, Instagram, and other e-commerce platforms.
- **Client Feedback:** Present design concepts to clients, making revisions and adjustments based on feedback.
- **Trend Awareness:** Stay current with design trends, emerging tools, and best practices in digital marketing to keep designs fresh and innovative.
**Requirements:**
- Proficiency in graphic design tools such as Canva, Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign).
- Proven experience creating digital ad creatives and visuals for social media platforms, particularly Facebook and Instagram.
- Strong understanding of design principles, typography, color theory, and visual storytelling.
- Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams to create effective and engaging ad content.
- Knowledge of the latest design trends and industry best practices.
- Strong communication skills to understand client needs and deliver creative solutions.
- A portfolio showcasing your design work, particularly related to digital marketing and social media ads.
- Ability to adapt designs to meet brand guidelines and client expectations.
- Comfortable working in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment.
- Availability to work during **EST hours**.
**Duties:**
- Design graphics for social media ads, websites, landing pages, and email campaigns.
- Collaborate with the media buying team to create high-performing ad creatives.
- Ensure all designs meet the specific requirements of the client while maintaining brand consistency.
- Revise and update designs based on client feedback and campaign performance.
- Stay updated with the latest design trends and tools to continually enhance your work.
**Success Metrics:**
- High-quality, visually compelling designs that align with client brand identity and campaign objectives.
- Positive feedback from clients on design work.
- Effective collaboration with the media buying and creative teams to develop impactful ad creatives.
- Timely delivery of design projects that meet deadlines.
- Consistently staying updated with design trends and applying them to your work or Apples
- Availability during EST working hours.
**Position Details:**
- Part-time (10 hours/week) for the first **4 weeks** during the training and probation period.
- Opportunity to transition to a full-time role based on performance and success metrics.
- Independent Freelancers only (no agencies, please).
If you have a passion for creating visually stunning digital designs and want to be part of a collaborative, fast-paced agency environment, we’d love to hear from you! Apply now to help elevate e-commerce brands through your creative expertise.

title: Digital Marketing Specialist for Campaign Management
description_text:
We need a talented and results-driven Digital Marketing Specialist to run social media campaigns . In this role, you will be responsible for managing, optimizing, and executing our advertising campaigns across multiple digital platforms, including Meta (formerly Facebook), TikTok, and Google Search.
As a Digital Marketing Specialist, you will play a crucial role in shaping our online presence and driving our digital marketing initiatives forward. The ideal candidate will possess a strong background in digital marketing, with a proven track record of creating and implementing successful marketing strategies that effectively drive engagement, enhance brand awareness, and boost conversions.
**Key Responsibilities:**
- **Campaign Management:** Develop, launch, and oversee digital advertising campaigns across Meta, TikTok, and Google Search, ensuring they align with our overall marketing objectives and brand voice.
- **Content Development:** Collaborate with the creative team to design compelling and engaging campaign content that resonates with our target audience and encourages interaction.
- **Performance Analysis:** Monitor and analyze campaign performance metrics, including click-through rates (CTR), conversion rates, return on ad spend (ROAS), and customer acquisition costs (CAC). Utilize data-driven insights to optimize campaigns for maximum effectiveness.
- **Strategic Adjustments:** Proactively adjust marketing strategies based on performance data, industry trends, and emerging best practices to continuously improve campaign outcomes.
- **Market Research:** Conduct thorough market research to identify new opportunities for growth and stay ahead of industry trends. This includes analyzing competitor strategies and identifying gaps in the market.
- **Collaboration:** Work closely with cross-functional teams, including sales, product development, and customer service, to ensure cohesive marketing efforts and alignment with business objectives.
- **Reporting:** Prepare and present regular reports on campaign performance and insights to stakeholders, highlighting successes and areas for improvement.
- **Budget Management:** Manage and allocate advertising budgets effectively to maximize ROI, ensuring that all campaigns stay within budget while achieving desired results.
- **Staying Current:** Keep abreast of the latest developments in digital marketing tools, techniques, and best practices to ensure our strategies remain innovative and competitive.
**Qualifications:**
- Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.
- A minimum of 2-3 years of experience in digital marketing, with a focus on paid advertising and campaign optimization.
- Strong understanding of digital marketing concepts, including SEO, PPC, social media marketing, and analytics.
- Proficiency in using advertising platforms such as Meta Ads Manager, Google Ads, and TikTok Ads Manager.
- Exceptional analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and make data-driven decisions.
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with a keen attention to detail.
- Ability to work independently as well as collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
- Passion for digital marketing and a desire to stay current with industry trends and innovations.
If you are a proactive, creative thinker with a passion for digital marketing and the skills to deliver outstanding results, we want to hear from you! Join our team and help us elevate our digital marketing efforts to new heights. Please submit your resume and a cover letter detailing your relevant experience and why you would be a great fit for our organization. We look forward to reviewing your application!

title: Neural Style Transfer & High-Resolution Image Upscaling Developer Needed
description_text:
We are seeking an experienced AI/ML developer to create a custom solution that unifies the artistic style across multiple AI-generated images (from Midjourney, DALL-E, etc.). The end goal is to produce images that share the same “brushstroke” style and can be upscaled for large-format printing (e.g., 4 ft x 4 ft) without losing quality.
### Project Scope & Deliverables:
1. Neural Style Transfer Implementation
- Develop or fine-tune a model (PyTorch or TensorFlow) to apply a consistent “oil painting” style across diverse images.
- Ensure stylistic consistency for different scenes or subjects (e.g., portraits, landscapes).
2. High-Resolution Upscaling
- Implement state-of-the-art super-resolution techniques (e.g., ESRGAN or Real-ESRGAN) to preserve detail at large sizes (A0, A1, or 4 ft x 4 ft).
- Maintain clarity and texture fidelity after upscaling.
3. Customization & Ownership
- We will provide reference/style images and test data.
- We require full ownership of the final program and source code (including the final trained model/checkpoints).
4. Integration & Ease of Use
- Ideally deliver a user-friendly script or small application that can accept new images and process them automatically.
- Provide clear documentation for setup and usage.
### Additional Details:
- Timeline: Sooner is better. Please share your estimated turnaround time.
- Budget: Flexible; open to discussing either fixed-price or hourly.
- Communication: Must be comfortable discussing scope and providing progress updates.
- Required Expertise:
- Deep learning frameworks (PyTorch/TensorFlow)

About Us
We believe the future is electric. From heating to transport, everything will run on clean electricity—and that future needs a new kind of power company.
Capture Energy is Europe’s first battery-backed power company. We buy electricity when it’s cheapest and cleanest, store it in decentralised batteries, and manage it with our in-house software, Capture AI. The result? Cleaner, cheaper, more reliable power for homes and businesses.
Right now, we’re focused on designing and installing the smartest battery systems possible—combining on-site surveys, intelligent system design, and AI-driven optimisation. But this is just the beginning. Our goal is to build the first power company designed entirely for the electrified world.
This isn’t your typical electrician job. Are you an experienced electrician who constantly looks for better ways to do things? Do you see how AI can improve design, surveying, and installation? Do you love batteries as much as we do? If so, let’s talk.

Conduct surveys (remote and on-site)
Coordinate sub-contractors to maintain best-in-class quality
Lead and manage G98/G99 applications and approvals
What You Bring
Minimum 3 years of experience as a certified electrician working under MCS
Strong technical competence in battery storage and solar PV, in line with MCS standards
Proactive mindset—you’re constantly seeking smarter ways to do things
Fluency with digital tools and a dislike for paper-based processes
Vehicle for site visits (must be within ~50km of London)
🤝 What We Offer
A unique opportunity to help build the future of energy
Remote-first work with flexible scheduling
A mission that truly matters
Competitive compensation
Pathway to a full-time or lead role as we scale
Your Path to Joining Us
Apply via the form: https://captureenergy.notion.site/1bfe7986daa780a89dd5ddb67f966364?pvs=105
1-hour in-person interview
Start shaping the future of electricity

title: Finance Manager (Based in North America) - Contract to Hire
description_text:
COMPANY OVERVIEW:
JDI Integrations is a US-based Service-Disabled Veteran-Owned Small Business (SDVOSB) that specializes in supplying US government organizations with physical security solutions, expeditionary site solutions, storage optimization solutions, communication solutions, and general contracting services. The company is committed to providing customers with seamless end-to-end services that include end-user training, product warranties, and technical support services.
JOB DESCRIPTION:
We are seeking a proactive and detail-oriented Finance Manager to oversee day-to-day financial operations, manage a small team, and ensure seamless financial coordination across departments. This role reports directly to the COO and plays a critical part in supporting our financial infrastructure. This is not a CFO role, but a mid-level position focused on execution, reporting, and communication.
This position starts as a part-time role (minimum 20 hours per week) with a 3-month probationary period, and may quickly transition to a full-time position based on performance and company needs.
RESPONSIBILITIES:
 Team Management:
o Supervise and support two bookkeepers: one for Accounts
o Receivable (AR) and one for Accounts Payable (AP).
o Act as the communication bridge between the AR bookkeeper and clients, and between the AP bookkeeper and contractors/employees.
 Financial Operations:
o Set up and manage payment requests using WISE.
o Ensure monthly P&L and Balance Sheet reports are reviewed and submitted to the COO in a timely and accurate manner.
o Maintain oversight of AR collections and AP disbursements, helping to resolve discrepancies and ensuring smooth cash flow.
 Stakeholder Communication:
o Provide customer-service-style updates in Slack regarding invoice/payment statuses for internal teams.
o Liaise with our financing partner to support cash flow and credit management.
QUALIFICATION:
 Proven experience as a Finance Manager or in a similar financial operations role.
 Hands-on experience with QuickBooks (Online preferred) and WISE (formerly TransferWise).
 Strong organizational and communication skills.
 Ability to work independently and manage a small team effectively.
 Based in North America and available during standard business hours.
 Comfortable reporting directly to executive leadership.
 Must be available at least 20 hours per week during the initial 3- month probationary period, with potential for full-time employment.
Preferred Qualifications:
 Accounting certifications (e.g., CPA) or equivalent financial education background.
 Prior experience in a service-based or contractor-heavy business environment.
What We’re Not Looking For:
This is not a CFO role. We're looking for someone who thrives in the execution of financial processes and management of small teams—not high-level strategy or fundraising.]

This is not an assembly-line editing gig. This is for someone who understands retention, pacing, and context — and wants to grow with a brand that’s making a real impact in the education space.
ABOUT US
YouTube channel: LSAT Unplugged
23K+ subscribers and growing
Audience: future law students (ages 22–35)
Content: LSAT coaching, law school admissions, expert strategy
Mission: help students get into law school — often debt-free
WHAT YOU’LL DO
Use Opus Clip to generate draft clips
Review and refine only the clips that make sense without context
Edit 20–50 short-form vertical videos per week (YouTube Shorts, TikTok, Reels)
WHAT SUCCESS LOOKS LIKE
Clips that regularly hit 1K+ views and maintain 70%+ watch time on platforms like Shorts, Reels, or TikTok
Strong hooks that stop the scroll
Subscriber growth from Shorts
WHAT WE’RE LOOKING FOR
Strong storytelling instincts
Experience editing short-form content from podcasts, interviews, or talking-heads
Familiar with Opus Clip and Descript
Reliable, detail-oriented, and self-managing
WHAT YOU GET
Weekly work with room to grow
Creative freedom
Clear brand assets and direction
Potential to take on higher-level content strategy
A meaningful mission and real audience impact
Your edits won’t disappear into the void — they’ll be seen by thousands of future law students every week.
High-volume, repeatable work — most edits follow a clear formula and take ~10–15 minutes once you get the hang of it
Opportunity to grow with a fast-scaling brand — potential for bonuses, raises, and strategy work over time
Your work won’t sit in a drive — every short gets published to a real audience with built-in reach
PAY
$3 per short (20–50 per week)
Most clips take ~10–15 minutes to finalize, especially with Opus Clip assisting.
Performance bonuses available — earn an extra $2 per short that hits 5K+ views or performs exceptionally well.
Room to grow into a higher-level role with more pay and responsibility if you're crushing it.

As a Digital Marketing Specialist, you will play a crucial role in shaping our online presence and driving our digital marketing initiatives forward. The ideal candidate will possess a strong background in digital marketing, with a proven track record of creating and implementing successful marketing strategies that effectively drive engagement, enhance brand awareness, and boost conversions.
**Key Responsibilities:**
- **Campaign Management:** Develop, launch, and oversee digital advertising campaigns across Meta, TikTok, and Google Search, ensuring they align with our overall marketing objectives and brand voice.
- **Content Development:** Collaborate with the creative team to design compelling and engaging campaign content that resonates with our target audience and encourages interaction.
- **Performance Analysis:** Monitor and analyze campaign performance metrics, including click-through rates (CTR), conversion rates, return on ad spend (ROAS), and customer acquisition costs (CAC). Utilize data-driven insights to optimize campaigns for maximum effectiveness.
- **Strategic Adjustments:** Proactively adjust marketing strategies based on performance data, industry trends, and emerging best practices to continuously improve campaign outcomes.
- **Market Research:** Conduct thorough market research to identify new opportunities for growth and stay ahead of industry trends. This includes analyzing competitor strategies and identifying gaps in the market.
- **Collaboration:** Work closely with cross-functional teams, including sales, product development, and customer service, to ensure cohesive marketing efforts and alignment with business objectives.
- **Reporting:** Prepare and present regular reports on campaign performance and insights to stakeholders, highlighting successes and areas for improvement.
- **Budget Management:** Manage and allocate advertising budgets effectively to maximize ROI, ensuring that all campaigns stay within budget while achieving desired results.
- **Staying Current:** Keep abreast of the latest developments in digital marketing tools, techniques, and best practices to ensure our strategies remain innovative and competitive.
**Qualifications:**
- Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.
- A minimum of 2-3 years of experience in digital marketing, with a focus on paid advertising and campaign optimization.
- Strong understanding of digital marketing concepts, including SEO, PPC, social media marketing, and analytics.
- Proficiency in using advertising platforms such as Meta Ads Manager, Google Ads, and TikTok Ads Manager.
- Exceptional analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and make data-driven decisions.
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with a keen attention to detail.
- Ability to work independently as well as collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
- Passion for digital marketing and a desire to stay current with industry trends and innovations.
If you are a proactive, creative thinker with a passion for digital marketing and the skills to deliver outstanding results, we want to hear from you! Join our team and help us elevate our digital marketing efforts to new heights. Please submit your resume and a cover letter detailing your relevant experience and why you would be a great fit for our organization. We look forward to reviewing your application!

title: Neural Style Transfer & High-Resolution Image Upscaling Developer Needed
description_text:
We are seeking an experienced AI/ML developer to create a custom solution that unifies the artistic style across multiple AI-generated images (from Midjourney, DALL-E, etc.). The end goal is to produce images that share the same “brushstroke” style and can be upscaled for large-format printing (e.g., 4 ft x 4 ft) without losing quality.
### Project Scope & Deliverables:
1. Neural Style Transfer Implementation
- Develop or fine-tune a model (PyTorch or TensorFlow) to apply a consistent “oil painting” style across diverse images.
- Ensure stylistic consistency for different scenes or subjects (e.g., portraits, landscapes).
2. High-Resolution Upscaling
- Implement state-of-the-art super-resolution techniques (e.g., ESRGAN or Real-ESRGAN) to preserve detail at large sizes (A0, A1, or 4 ft x 4 ft).
- Maintain clarity and texture fidelity after upscaling.
3. Customization & Ownership
- We will provide reference/style images and test data.
- We require full ownership of the final program and source code (including the final trained model/checkpoints).
4. Integration & Ease of Use
- Ideally deliver a user-friendly script or small application that can accept new images and process them automatically.
- Provide clear documentation for setup and usage.
### Additional Details:
- Timeline: Sooner is better. Please share your estimated turnaround time.
- Budget: Flexible; open to discussing either fixed-price or hourly.
- Communication: Must be comfortable discussing scope and providing progress updates.
- Required Expertise:
- Deep learning frameworks (PyTorch/TensorFlow)
- Neural style transfer (Gatys-style NST, FastNST, LoRA, or custom approach)
- Super-resolution/upscaling (ESRGAN, Real-ESRGAN, or similar)
- Image processing & computer vision best practices
- GPU-based development experience is a plus
If you have a proven track record in AI-driven image manipulation, style transfer, or upscaling for print, we’d love to see examples of your work or portfolio.

title: Electrician (Part-Time / Contract) - Contract to Hire
description_text:
About Us
We believe the future is electric. From heating to transport, everything will run on clean electricity—and that future needs a new kind of power company.
Capture Energy is Europe’s first battery-backed power company. We buy electricity when it’s cheapest and cleanest, store it in decentralised batteries, and manage it with our in-house software, Capture AI. The result? Cleaner, cheaper, more reliable power for homes and businesses.
Right now, we’re focused on designing and installing the smartest battery systems possible—combining on-site surveys, intelligent system design, and AI-driven optimisation. But this is just the beginning. Our goal is to build the first power company designed entirely for the electrified world.
This isn’t your typical electrician job. Are you an experienced electrician who constantly looks for better ways to do things? Do you see how AI can improve design, surveying, and installation? Do you love batteries as much as we do? If so, let’s talk.
Your Role
Act as our Qualified Technical Person (QTP) for MCS purposes—overseeing all technical aspects of certification
Design residential and commercial battery systems
Conduct surveys (remote and on-site)
Coordinate sub-contractors to maintain best-in-class quality
Lead and manage G98/G99 applications and approvals
What You Bring
Minimum 3 years of experience as a certified electrician working under MCS
Strong technical competence in battery storage and solar PV, in line with MCS standards
Proactive mindset—you’re constantly seeking smarter ways to do things
Fluency with digital tools and a dislike for paper-based processes
Vehicle for site visits (must be within ~50km of London)
🤝 What We Offer
A unique opportunity to help build the future of energy
Remote-first work with flexible scheduling
A mission that truly matters
Competitive compensation
Pathway to a full-time or lead role as we scale
Your Path to Joining Us
Apply via the form: https://captureenergy.notion.site/1bfe7986daa780a89dd5ddb67f966364?pvs=105
1-hour in-person interview
Start shaping the future of electricity

title: Finance Manager (Based in North America) - Contract to Hire
description_text:
COMPANY OVERVIEW:
JDI Integrations is a US-based Service-Disabled Veteran-Owned Small Business (SDVOSB) that specializes in supplying US government organizations with physical security solutions, expeditionary site solutions, storage optimization solutions, communication solutions, and general contracting services. The company is committed to providing customers with seamless end-to-end services that include end-user training, product warranties, and technical support services.
JOB DESCRIPTION:
We are seeking a proactive and detail-oriented Finance Manager to oversee day-to-day financial operations, manage a small team, and ensure seamless financial coordination across departments. This role reports directly to the COO and plays a critical part in supporting our financial infrastructure. This is not a CFO role, but a mid-level position focused on execution, reporting, and communication.
This position starts as a part-time role (minimum 20 hours per week) with a 3-month probationary period, and may quickly transition to a full-time position based on performance and company needs.
RESPONSIBILITIES:
 Team Management:
o Supervise and support two bookkeepers: one for Accounts
o Receivable (AR) and one for Accounts Payable (AP).
o Act as the communication bridge between the AR bookkeeper and clients, and between the AP bookkeeper and contractors/employees.
 Financial Operations:
o Set up and manage payment requests using WISE.
o Ensure monthly P&L and Balance Sheet reports are reviewed and submitted to the COO in a timely and accurate manner.
o Maintain oversight of AR collections and AP disbursements, helping to resolve discrepancies and ensuring smooth cash flow.
 Stakeholder Communication:
o Provide customer-service-style updates in Slack regarding invoice/payment statuses for internal teams.
o Liaise with our financing partner to support cash flow and credit management.
QUALIFICATION:
 Proven experience as a Finance Manager or in a similar financial operations role.
 Hands-on experience with QuickBooks (Online preferred) and WISE (formerly TransferWise).
 Strong organizational and communication skills.
 Ability to work independently and manage a small team effectively.
 Based in North America and available during standard business hours.
 Comfortable reporting directly to executive leadership.
 Must be available at least 20 hours per week during the initial 3- month probationary period, with potential for full-time employment.
Preferred Qualifications:
 Accounting certifications (e.g., CPA) or equivalent financial education background.
 Prior experience in a service-based or contractor-heavy business environment.
What We’re Not Looking For:

title: 🎬 Video Editor for YouTube Shorts (Opus Clip)
description_text:
We're looking for a sharp, strategic video editor to turn our long-form YouTube videos into short-form content that stops the scroll, delivers value fast, and drives real engagement.
You’ll use Opus Clip to generate rough cuts — but the real magic comes from your judgment. You’ll choose the clips that actually land, then shape them into clean, high-retention vertical videos for Shorts, Reels, and TikTok.
This is not an assembly-line editing gig. This is for someone who understands retention, pacing, and context — and wants to grow with a brand that’s making a real impact in the education space.
ABOUT US
YouTube channel: LSAT Unplugged
23K+ subscribers and growing
Audience: future law students (ages 22–35)
Content: LSAT coaching, law school admissions, expert strategy
Mission: help students get into law school — often debt-free
WHAT YOU’LL DO
Use Opus Clip to generate draft clips
Review and refine only the clips that make sense without context
Edit 20–50 short-form vertical videos per week (YouTube Shorts, TikTok, Reels)
WHAT SUCCESS LOOKS LIKE
Clips that regularly hit 1K+ views and maintain 70%+ watch time on platforms like Shorts, Reels, or TikTok
Strong hooks that stop the scroll
Subscriber growth from Shorts
WHAT WE’RE LOOKING FOR
Strong storytelling instincts
Experience editing short-form content from podcasts, interviews, or talking-heads
Familiar with Opus Clip and Descript
Reliable, detail-oriented, and self-managing
WHAT YOU GET
Weekly work with room to grow
Creative freedom
Clear brand assets and direction
Potential to take on higher-level content strategy
A meaningful mission and real audience impact
Your edits won’t disappear into the void — they’ll be seen by thousands of future law students every week.
High-volume, repeatable work — most edits follow a clear formula and take ~10–15 minutes once you get the hang of it
Opportunity to grow with a fast-scaling brand — potential for bonuses, raises, and strategy work over time
Your work won’t sit in a drive — every short gets published to a real audience with built-in reach
PAY
$3 per short (20–50 per week)
Most clips take ~10–15 minutes to finalize, especially with Opus Clip assisting.
Performance bonuses available — earn an extra $2 per short that hits 5K+ views or performs exceptionally well.
Room to grow into a higher-level role with more pay and responsibility if you're crushing it.

title: Web Designer & Webflow Certified Developer Needed for Website Revamp
description_text:
FirmRoom is a fast-growing platform for secure document sharing and deal collaboration, used by investment banks, private equity firms, and legal teams. We're evolving to be an AI-first solution focused on simplicity, speed, and modern workflows and we need a website that reflects that.
Our site is built in Webflow with a solid foundation, but we’re evolving our product - and the site needs to reflect that with sharper design, stronger UX, and new landing pages that better tell our story and convert. This is not a from-scratch job. You’ll be working with an existing site - but we’re looking for someone with taste, patience, and precision to take it to the next level.
Scope Includes:
Audit and improve our existing pages (starting with homepage and pricing)
Design new pages in Figma and implement them in Webflow
Build with clean CMS logic and responsive best practices
Ensure consistent design system and styling across pages
Collaborate closely with our internal team
Ideal Candidate:
Webflow Certified (must include your certification URL)
Highly skilled in Figma and modern design systems
Portfolio includes clean, modern SaaS or B2B websites
Patient, thoughtful, and collaborative
Bonus: experience with conversion optimization and light SEO
Able to turn product vision into clear, usable, credible web experiences
Pages for Audit:
Homepage (https://firmroom.com)
Pricing Page (https://firmroom.com/pricing)
To Apply, Please Submit:
1. A brief audit of the homepage and pricing page - list your Top 10 improvement suggestions (visual, UX, copy structure or more)
2. Your Top 2 Figma designs you’re most proud of
3. At least 1 live Webflow site you’ve built (especially if you designed it too)
4. Your Webflow Certification URL (required)
If Shortlisted:
We’ll move forward with a small paid test project to evaluate fit before diving into the broader scope.

title: Graphic Designer for marketing agency servicing eCom DTC brands running paid FB/iG ads - Contract to Hire
description_text:
We’re a fast-growing marketing agency focused on helping e-commerce brands elevate their digital presence. We’re looking for a talented Graphic Designer to join our team on a part-time basis. In this role, you will collaborate closely with our creative and media teams to design visually compelling content that resonates with our clients' target audiences across various digital platforms, particularly Meta (Facebook & Instagram).
**Responsibilities:**
- **Creative Design:** Design high-quality, visually engaging graphics for social media ads, websites, email campaigns, and more, tailored to our clients' brand identities.
- **Brand Consistency:** Ensure all designs align with client brand guidelines, maintaining consistency across various digital platforms.
- **Ad Design & Optimization:** Create ad creatives that drive engagement and conversions. Continuously collaborate with the media buying team to optimize designs based on performance metrics.
- **Collaborative Projects:** Work with the media buying team to develop ad creatives, landing pages, and other visual assets that align with campaign goals.
- **Adaptability:** Design for different digital channels, ensuring that graphics are optimized for Facebook, Instagram, and other e-commerce platforms.
- **Client Feedback:** Present design concepts to clients, making revisions and adjustments based on feedback.
- **Trend Awareness:** Stay current with design trends, emerging tools, and best practices in digital marketing to keep designs fresh and innovative.
**Requirements:**
- Proficiency in graphic design tools such as Canva, Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign).
- Proven experience creating digital ad creatives and visuals for social media platforms, particularly Facebook and Instagram.
- Strong understanding of design principles, typography, color theory, and visual storytelling.
- Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams to create effective and engaging ad content.
- Knowledge of the latest design trends and industry best practices.
- Strong communication skills to understand client needs and deliver creative solutions.
- A portfolio showcasing your design work, particularly related to digital marketing and social media ads.
- Ability to adapt designs to meet brand guidelines and client expectations.
- Comfortable working in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment.
- Availability to work during **EST hours**.
**Duties:**
- Design graphics for social media ads, websites, landing pages, and email campaigns.
- Collaborate with the media buying team to create high-performing ad creatives.
- Ensure all designs meet the specific requirements of the client while maintaining brand consistency.
- Revise and update designs based on client feedback and campaign performance.
- Stay updated with the latest design trends and tools to continually enhance your work.
**Success Metrics:**
- High-quality, visually compelling designs that align with client brand identity and campaign objectives.
- Positive feedback from clients on design work.
- Effective collaboration with the media buying and creative teams to develop impactful ad creatives.
- Timely delivery of design projects that meet deadlines.
- Consistently staying updated with design trends and applying them to your work or Apples
- Availability during EST working hours.
**Position Details:**
- Part-time (10 hours/week) for the first **4 weeks** during the training and probation period.
- Opportunity to transition to a full-time role based on performance and success metrics.
- Independent Freelancers only (no agencies, please).
If you have a passion for creating visually stunning digital designs and want to be part of a collaborative, fast-paced agency environment, we’d love to hear from you! Apply now to help elevate e-commerce brands through your creative expertise.

title: Digital Marketing Specialist for Campaign Management
description_text:
We need a talented and results-driven Digital Marketing Specialist to run social media campaigns . In this role, you will be responsible for managing, optimizing, and executing our advertising campaigns across multiple digital platforms, including Meta (formerly Facebook), TikTok, and Google Search.
As a Digital Marketing Specialist, you will play a crucial role in shaping our online presence and driving our digital marketing initiatives forward. The ideal candidate will possess a strong background in digital marketing, with a proven track record of creating and implementing successful marketing strategies that effectively drive engagement, enhance brand awareness, and boost conversions.
**Key Responsibilities:**
- **Campaign Management:** Develop, launch, and oversee digital advertising campaigns across Meta, TikTok, and Google Search, ensuring they align with our overall marketing objectives and brand voice.
- **Content Development:** Collaborate with the creative team to design compelling and engaging campaign content that resonates with our target audience and encourages interaction.
- **Performance Analysis:** Monitor and analyze campaign performance metrics, including click-through rates (CTR), conversion rates, return on ad spend (ROAS), and customer acquisition costs (CAC). Utilize data-driven insights to optimize campaigns for maximum effectiveness.
- **Strategic Adjustments:** Proactively adjust marketing strategies based on performance data, industry trends, and emerging best practices to continuously improve campaign outcomes.
- **Market Research:** Conduct thorough market research to identify new opportunities for growth and stay ahead of industry trends. This includes analyzing competitor strategies and identifying gaps in the market.
- **Collaboration:** Work closely with cross-functional teams, including sales, product development, and customer service, to ensure cohesive marketing efforts and alignment with business objectives.
- **Reporting:** Prepare and present regular reports on campaign performance and insights to stakeholders, highlighting successes and areas for improvement.
- **Budget Management:** Manage and allocate advertising budgets effectively to maximize ROI, ensuring that all campaigns stay within budget while achieving desired results.
- **Staying Current:** Keep abreast of the latest developments in digital marketing tools, techniques, and best practices to ensure our strategies remain innovative and competitive.
**Qualifications:**
- Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.
- A minimum of 2-3 years of experience in digital marketing, with a focus on paid advertising and campaign optimization.
- Strong understanding of digital marketing concepts, including SEO, PPC, social media marketing, and analytics.
- Proficiency in using advertising platforms such as Meta Ads Manager, Google Ads, and TikTok Ads Manager.
- Exceptional analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and make data-driven decisions.
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with a keen attention to detail.
- Ability to work independently as well as collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
- Passion for digital marketing and a desire to stay current with industry trends and innovations.
If you are a proactive, creative thinker with a passion for digital marketing and the skills to deliver outstanding results, we want to hear from you! Join our team and help us elevate our digital marketing efforts to new heights. Please submit your resume and a cover letter detailing your relevant experience and why you would be a great fit for our organization. We look forward to reviewing your application!

title: Neural Style Transfer & High-Resolution Image Upscaling Developer Needed
description_text:
We are seeking an experienced AI/ML developer to create a custom solution that unifies the artistic style across multiple AI-generated images (from Midjourney, DALL-E, etc.). The end goal is to produce images that share the same “brushstroke” style and can be upscaled for large-format printing (e.g., 4 ft x 4 ft) without losing quality.
### Project Scope & Deliverables:
1. Neural Style Transfer Implementation
- Develop or fine-tune a model (PyTorch or TensorFlow) to apply a consistent “oil painting” style across diverse images.
- Ensure stylistic consistency for different scenes or subjects (e.g., portraits, landscapes).
2. High-Resolution Upscaling
- Implement state-of-the-art super-resolution techniques (e.g., ESRGAN or Real-ESRGAN) to preserve detail at large sizes (A0, A1, or 4 ft x 4 ft).
- Maintain clarity and texture fidelity after upscaling.
3. Customization & Ownership
- We will provide reference/style images and test data.
- We require full ownership of the final program and source code (including the final trained model/checkpoints).
4. Integration & Ease of Use
- Ideally deliver a user-friendly script or small application that can accept new images and process them automatically.
- Provide clear documentation for setup and usage.
### Additional Details:
- Timeline: Sooner is better. Please share your estimated turnaround time.
- Budget: Flexible; open to discussing either fixed-price or hourly.
- Communication: Must be comfortable discussing scope and providing progress updates.
- Required Expertise:
- Deep learning frameworks (PyTorch/TensorFlow)
- Neural style transfer (Gatys-style NST, FastNST, LoRA, or custom approach)
- Super-resolution/upscaling (ESRGAN, Real-ESRGAN, or similar)
- Image processing & computer vision best practices
- GPU-based development experience is a plus
If you have a proven track record in AI-driven image manipulation, style transfer, or upscaling for print, we’d love to see examples of your work or portfolio.

We believe the future is electric. From heating to transport, everything will run on clean electricity—and that future needs a new kind of power company.
Capture Energy is Europe’s first battery-backed power company. We buy electricity when it’s cheapest and cleanest, store it in decentralised batteries, and manage it with our in-house software, Capture AI. The result? Cleaner, cheaper, more reliable power for homes and businesses.
Right now, we’re focused on designing and installing the smartest battery systems possible—combining on-site surveys, intelligent system design, and AI-driven optimisation. But this is just the beginning. Our goal is to build the first power company designed entirely for the electrified world.
This isn’t your typical electrician job. Are you an experienced electrician who constantly looks for better ways to do things? Do you see how AI can improve design, surveying, and installation? Do you love batteries as much as we do? If so, let’s talk.

Coordinate sub-contractors to maintain best-in-class quality
Lead and manage G98/G99 applications and approvals
What You Bring
Minimum 3 years of experience as a certified electrician working under MCS
Strong technical competence in battery storage and solar PV, in line with MCS standards
Proactive mindset—you’re constantly seeking smarter ways to do things
Fluency with digital tools and a dislike for paper-based processes
Vehicle for site visits (must be within ~50km of London)
🤝 What We Offer
A unique opportunity to help build the future of energy
Remote-first work with flexible scheduling
A mission that truly matters
Competitive compensation
Pathway to a full-time or lead role as we scale
Your Path to Joining Us
Apply via the form: https://captureenergy.notion.site/1bfe7986daa780a89dd5ddb67f966364?pvs=105
1-hour in-person interview
Start shaping the future of electricity

title: Finance Manager (Based in North America) - Contract to Hire
description_text:
COMPANY OVERVIEW:
JDI Integrations is a US-based Service-Disabled Veteran-Owned Small Business (SDVOSB) that specializes in supplying US government organizations with physical security solutions, expeditionary site solutions, storage optimization solutions, communication solutions, and general contracting services. The company is committed to providing customers with seamless end-to-end services that include end-user training, product warranties, and technical support services.
JOB DESCRIPTION:
We are seeking a proactive and detail-oriented Finance Manager to oversee day-to-day financial operations, manage a small team, and ensure seamless financial coordination across departments. This role reports directly to the COO and plays a critical part in supporting our financial infrastructure. This is not a CFO role, but a mid-level position focused on execution, reporting, and communication.
This position starts as a part-time role (minimum 20 hours per week) with a 3-month probationary period, and may quickly transition to a full-time position based on performance and company needs.
RESPONSIBILITIES:
 Team Management:
o Supervise and support two bookkeepers: one for Accounts
o Receivable (AR) and one for Accounts Payable (AP).
o Act as the communication bridge between the AR bookkeeper and clients, and between the AP bookkeeper and contractors/employees.
 Financial Operations:
o Set up and manage payment requests using WISE.
o Ensure monthly P&L and Balance Sheet reports are reviewed and submitted to the COO in a timely and accurate manner.
o Maintain oversight of AR collections and AP disbursements, helping to resolve discrepancies and ensuring smooth cash flow.
 Stakeholder Communication:
o Provide customer-service-style updates in Slack regarding invoice/payment statuses for internal teams.
o Liaise with our financing partner to support cash flow and credit management.
QUALIFICATION:
 Proven experience as a Finance Manager or in a similar financial operations role.
 Hands-on experience with QuickBooks (Online preferred) and WISE (formerly TransferWise).
 Strong organizational and communication skills.
 Ability to work independently and manage a small team effectively.
 Based in North America and available during standard business hours.
 Comfortable reporting directly to executive leadership.
 Must be available at least 20 hours per week during the initial 3- month probationary period, with potential for full-time employment.
Preferred Qualifications:
 Accounting certifications (e.g., CPA) or equivalent financial education background.
 Prior experience in a service-based or contractor-heavy business environment.
What We’re Not Looking For:
This is not a CFO role. We're looking for someone who thrives in the execution of financial processes and management of small teams—not high-level strategy or fundraising.]

title: 🎬 Video Editor for YouTube Shorts (Opus Clip)

We're looking for a sharp, strategic video editor to turn our long-form YouTube videos into short-form content that stops the scroll, delivers value fast, and drives real engagement.
You’ll use Opus Clip to generate rough cuts — but the real magic comes from your judgment. You’ll choose the clips that actually land, then shape them into clean, high-retention vertical videos for Shorts, Reels, and TikTok.
This is not an assembly-line editing gig. This is for someone who understands retention, pacing, and context — and wants to grow with a brand that’s making a real impact in the education space.
ABOUT US
YouTube channel: LSAT Unplugged
23K+ subscribers and growing
Audience: future law students (ages 22–35)
Content: LSAT coaching, law school admissions, expert strategy
Mission: help students get into law school — often debt-free
WHAT YOU’LL DO
Use Opus Clip to generate draft clips
Review and refine only the clips that make sense without context
Edit 20–50 short-form vertical videos per week (YouTube Shorts, TikTok, Reels)
WHAT SUCCESS LOOKS LIKE
Clips that regularly hit 1K+ views and maintain 70%+ watch time on platforms like Shorts, Reels, or TikTok
Strong hooks that stop the scroll
Subscriber growth from Shorts
WHAT WE’RE LOOKING FOR
Strong storytelling instincts
Experience editing short-form content from podcasts, interviews, or talking-heads
Familiar with Opus Clip and Descript
Reliable, detail-oriented, and self-managing
WHAT YOU GET
Weekly work with room to grow
Creative freedom
Clear brand assets and direction
Potential to take on higher-level content strategy
A meaningful mission and real audience impact
Your edits won’t disappear into the void — they’ll be seen by thousands of future law students every week.
High-volume, repeatable work — most edits follow a clear formula and take ~10–15 minutes once you get the hang of it
Opportunity to grow with a fast-scaling brand — potential for bonuses, raises, and strategy work over time
Your work won’t sit in a drive — every short gets published to a real audience with built-in reach
PAY
$3 per short (20–50 per week)
Most clips take ~10–15 minutes to finalize, especially with Opus Clip assisting.
Performance bonuses available — earn an extra $2 per short that hits 5K+ views or performs exceptionally well.
Room to grow into a higher-level role with more pay and responsibility if you're crushing it.

title: Graphic Designer for marketing agency servicing eCom DTC brands running paid FB/iG ads - Contract to Hire
description_text:
We’re a fast-growing marketing agency focused on helping e-commerce brands elevate their digital presence. We’re looking for a talented Graphic Designer to join our team on a part-time basis. In this role, you will collaborate closely with our creative and media teams to design visually compelling content that resonates with our clients' target audiences across various digital platforms, particularly Meta (Facebook & Instagram).
**Responsibilities:**
- **Creative Design:** Design high-quality, visually engaging graphics for social media ads, websites, email campaigns, and more, tailored to our clients' brand identities.
- **Brand Consistency:** Ensure all designs align with client brand guidelines, maintaining consistency across various digital platforms.
- **Ad Design & Optimization:** Create ad creatives that drive engagement and conversions. Continuously collaborate with the media buying team to optimize designs based on performance metrics.
- **Collaborative Projects:** Work with the media buying team to develop ad creatives, landing pages, and other visual assets that align with campaign goals.
- **Adaptability:** Design for different digital channels, ensuring that graphics are optimized for Facebook, Instagram, and other e-commerce platforms.
- **Client Feedback:** Present design concepts to clients, making revisions and adjustments based on feedback.
- **Trend Awareness:** Stay current with design trends, emerging tools, and best practices in digital marketing to keep designs fresh and innovative.
**Requirements:**
- Proficiency in graphic design tools such as Canva, Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign).
- Proven experience creating digital ad creatives and visuals for social media platforms, particularly Facebook and Instagram.
- Strong understanding of design principles, typography, color theory, and visual storytelling.
- Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams to create effective and engaging ad content.
- Knowledge of the latest design trends and industry best practices.
- Strong communication skills to understand client needs and deliver creative solutions.
- A portfolio showcasing your design work, particularly related to digital marketing and social media ads.
- Ability to adapt designs to meet brand guidelines and client expectations.
- Comfortable working in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment.
- Availability to work during **EST hours**.
**Duties:**
- Design graphics for social media ads, websites, landing pages, and email campaigns.
- Collaborate with the media buying team to create high-performing ad creatives.
- Ensure all designs meet the specific requirements of the client while maintaining brand consistency.
- Revise and update designs based on client feedback and campaign performance.
- Stay updated with the latest design trends and tools to continually enhance your work.
**Success Metrics:**
- High-quality, visually compelling designs that align with client brand identity and campaign objectives.
- Positive feedback from clients on design work.
- Effective collaboration with the media buying and creative teams to develop impactful ad creatives.
- Timely delivery of design projects that meet deadlines.
- Consistently staying updated with design trends and applying them to your work or Apples
- Availability during EST working hours.
**Position Details:**
- Part-time (10 hours/week) for the first **4 weeks** during the training and probation period.
- Opportunity to transition to a full-time role based on performance and success metrics.
- Independent Freelancers only (no agencies, please).
If you have a passion for creating visually stunning digital designs and want to be part of a collaborative, fast-paced agency environment, we’d love to hear from you! Apply now to help elevate e-commerce brands through your creative expertise.

title: Digital Marketing Specialist for Campaign Management
description_text:
We need a talented and results-driven Digital Marketing Specialist to run social media campaigns . In this role, you will be responsible for managing, optimizing, and executing our advertising campaigns across multiple digital platforms, including Meta (formerly Facebook), TikTok, and Google Search.
As a Digital Marketing Specialist, you will play a crucial role in shaping our online presence and driving our digital marketing initiatives forward. The ideal candidate will possess a strong background in digital marketing, with a proven track record of creating and implementing successful marketing strategies that effectively drive engagement, enhance brand awareness, and boost conversions.
**Key Responsibilities:**
- **Campaign Management:** Develop, launch, and oversee digital advertising campaigns across Meta, TikTok, and Google Search, ensuring they align with our overall marketing objectives and brand voice.
- **Content Development:** Collaborate with the creative team to design compelling and engaging campaign content that resonates with our target audience and encourages interaction.
- **Performance Analysis:** Monitor and analyze campaign performance metrics, including click-through rates (CTR), conversion rates, return on ad spend (ROAS), and customer acquisition costs (CAC). Utilize data-driven insights to optimize campaigns for maximum effectiveness.
- **Strategic Adjustments:** Proactively adjust marketing strategies based on performance data, industry trends, and emerging best practices to continuously improve campaign outcomes.
- **Market Research:** Conduct thorough market research to identify new opportunities for growth and stay ahead of industry trends. This includes analyzing competitor strategies and identifying gaps in the market.
- **Collaboration:** Work closely with cross-functional teams, including sales, product development, and customer service, to ensure cohesive marketing efforts and alignment with business objectives.
- **Reporting:** Prepare and present regular reports on campaign performance and insights to stakeholders, highlighting successes and areas for improvement.
- **Budget Management:** Manage and allocate advertising budgets effectively to maximize ROI, ensuring that all campaigns stay within budget while achieving desired results.
- **Staying Current:** Keep abreast of the latest developments in digital marketing tools, techniques, and best practices to ensure our strategies remain innovative and competitive.
**Qualifications:**
- Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.
- A minimum of 2-3 years of experience in digital marketing, with a focus on paid advertising and campaign optimization.
- Strong understanding of digital marketing concepts, including SEO, PPC, social media marketing, and analytics.
- Proficiency in using advertising platforms such as Meta Ads Manager, Google Ads, and TikTok Ads Manager.
- Exceptional analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and make data-driven decisions.
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with a keen attention to detail.
- Ability to work independently as well as collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
- Passion for digital marketing and a desire to stay current with industry trends and innovations.
If you are a proactive, creative thinker with a passion for digital marketing and the skills to deliver outstanding results, we want to hear from you! Join our team and help us elevate our digital marketing efforts to new heights. Please submit your resume and a cover letter detailing your relevant experience and why you would be a great fit for our organization. We look forward to reviewing your application!

title: Neural Style Transfer & High-Resolution Image Upscaling Developer Needed
description_text:
We are seeking an experienced AI/ML developer to create a custom solution that unifies the artistic style across multiple AI-generated images (from Midjourney, DALL-E, etc.). The end goal is to produce images that share the same “brushstroke” style and can be upscaled for large-format printing (e.g., 4 ft x 4 ft) without losing quality.
### Project Scope & Deliverables:
1. Neural Style Transfer Implementation
- Develop or fine-tune a model (PyTorch or TensorFlow) to apply a consistent “oil painting” style across diverse images.
- Ensure stylistic consistency for different scenes or subjects (e.g., portraits, landscapes).
2. High-Resolution Upscaling
- Implement state-of-the-art super-resolution techniques (e.g., ESRGAN or Real-ESRGAN) to preserve detail at large sizes (A0, A1, or 4 ft x 4 ft).
- Maintain clarity and texture fidelity after upscaling.
3. Customization & Ownership
- We will provide reference/style images and test data.
- We require full ownership of the final program and source code (including the final trained model/checkpoints).
4. Integration & Ease of Use
- Ideally deliver a user-friendly script or small application that can accept new images and process them automatically.
- Provide clear documentation for setup and usage.
### Additional Details:
- Timeline: Sooner is better. Please share your estimated turnaround time.
- Budget: Flexible; open to discussing either fixed-price or hourly.
- Communication: Must be comfortable discussing scope and providing progress updates.
- Required Expertise:
- Deep learning frameworks (PyTorch/TensorFlow)
- Neural style transfer (Gatys-style NST, FastNST, LoRA, or custom approach)
- Super-resolution/upscaling (ESRGAN, Real-ESRGAN, or similar)
- Image processing & computer vision best practices
- GPU-based development experience is a plus
If you have a proven track record in AI-driven image manipulation, style transfer, or upscaling for print, we’d love to see examples of your work or portfolio.

We are seeking a proactive and detail-oriented Finance Manager to oversee day-to-day financial operations, manage a small team, and ensure seamless financial coordination across departments. This role reports directly to the COO and plays a critical part in supporting our financial infrastructure. This is not a CFO role, but a mid-level position focused on execution, reporting, and communication.
This position starts as a part-time role (minimum 20 hours per week) with a 3-month probationary period, and may quickly transition to a full-time position based on performance and company needs.
RESPONSIBILITIES:
 Team Management:
o Supervise and support two bookkeepers: one for Accounts
o Receivable (AR) and one for Accounts Payable (AP).
o Act as the communication bridge between the AR bookkeeper and clients, and between the AP bookkeeper and contractors/employees.
 Financial Operations:
o Set up and manage payment requests using WISE.
o Ensure monthly P&L and Balance Sheet reports are reviewed and submitted to the COO in a timely and accurate manner.
o Maintain oversight of AR collections and AP disbursements, helping to resolve discrepancies and ensuring smooth cash flow.
 Stakeholder Communication:
o Provide customer-service-style updates in Slack regarding invoice/payment statuses for internal teams.
o Liaise with our financing partner to support cash flow and credit management.
QUALIFICATION:
 Proven experience as a Finance Manager or in a similar financial operations role.
 Hands-on experience with QuickBooks (Online preferred) and WISE (formerly TransferWise).
 Strong organizational and communication skills.
 Ability to work independently and manage a small team effectively.
 Based in North America and available during standard business hours.
 Comfortable reporting directly to executive leadership.
 Must be available at least 20 hours per week during the initial 3- month probationary period, with potential for full-time employment.
Preferred Qualifications:
 Accounting certifications (e.g., CPA) or equivalent financial education background.
 Prior experience in a service-based or contractor-heavy business environment.
What We’re Not Looking For:
This is not a CFO role. We're looking for someone who thrives in the execution of financial processes and management of small teams—not high-level strategy or fundraising.]
